title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq sell-off builds as tech rout continues, bitcoin plunges
full_text: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq sell-off builds as tech rout continues, bitcoin plunges. Wall Street is looking to Amazon with high hopes after a rough week in tech, as silver plunges again and bitcoin drops near $65,000.. The performance of Amazon's (AMZN) cloud business, AWS, will be keenly examined when its earnings report lands later, after Microsoft (MSFT) stock plunged last week, in part due to a slowdown in clou… [+1469 chars]
